duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the account runs smoothly daily by staying highly organized and providing the best customer service experience possible.
Assist in maintaining strong relationships with customers and carriers through consistent communication and award-winning customer service.
Perform various account management tasks such as load building, appointment scheduling, phone management, and email correspondence.
Dispatch trucks to their pickup location and conduct daily check calls to ensure timely pickup and delivery of product.
Qualify carriers that are the best match for customers' shipments and communicate details about shipments and negotiate rates with prospective carriers.
Ad hoc duties to support logistics operations.
